monthly_regional_data.oceanographic_summary: 2003-01 data from Arabian Sea shows average temperatures of 18.5°C and salinity of 36.1. Deep water measurements extend to 1999m depth.
2003-01 data from Bay of Bengal shows average temperatures of 20.8°C and salinity of 34.5.
2003-01 data from Equatorial Region shows average temperatures of 16.4°C and salinity of 34.9. Deep water measurements extend to 2020m depth.
2003-01 data from Indian Ocean shows average temperatures of 9.4°C and salinity of 34.8. Deep water measurements extend to 2295m depth. Cool waters suggest high latitude or deep water influence.
